alert.note: Alert for Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Franklin; Lamoille; Western Chittenden; Western Franklin (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 1:58PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Lamoille, central Chittenden and Franklin Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 158 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Essex Junction, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Essex Junction, Burlington International Airport, South Burlington, Burlington, Enosburg Falls, Franklin, Swanton Village, Winooski, Cambridge Village, Highgate Falls, Westford, Essex Junction Village, St. Albans City, Fairfax, Williston, Sheldon, Georgia, Lake Carmi State Park, Richmond, and Swanton. This includes Interstate 89 between mile markers 73 and 129. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Franklin; Lamoille; Western Chittenden; Western Franklin
